ModMetaData.name: Cooking Breakup
ModMetaData.author: br410bury
ModMetaData.description:
Break cooking tasks into logical sub-units.
Breaks up and modifies the Cooking work type in the following manner: • Moves brewing task to a new work type called Brewing • Copies the Fill Fermenting Barrel task into the Brewing Subtask¹ • Adds a work type called Butcher that commands pawns to produce meat²
1: These are not moved out of the Hauling work type so a pawn set to Hauling will also fill fermenting barrels as well. 2: These are not moved out of the Cooking work type so a pawn set to Cooking will also butcher meat as needed as well.
